data.name: Evolution of War
data.detailed_description:
The Evolution of War game shows the evolution of warfare in 5 ages, starting with the age of dinosaurs, crusades, medieval, 21st century (present time) and futuristic (fiction).
The game's main objective is to destroy the enemy base, but for that to happen you'll need to defend yourself and attack by planning a good strategy.
You can select up to 3 types of soldiers to put into battle being one of the weakest, medium and strongest in each era, however you will need to have the necessary money to buy them.
You can add new weapons to the base, which can include up to 6 weapons, each additional weapon has a cost. Where you earn money by killing enemy troops and attacking the enemy base.

data.short_description: The Evolution of War game shows the evolution of warfare in 5 ages, starting with the age of dinosaurs, crusades, medieval, 21st century (present time) and futuristic (fiction).The game's main objective is to destroy the enemy base.
data.reviews:
“The game is a lot of fun!”
10 – Vic

“The game's artificial intelligence is very good.”
10 – Wand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04.5 LTS – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04.5 LTS – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4, Intel Core or AMD Athlon – 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000/4000, NVIDIA GeForce 8600M GT or AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 2400 – 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
